title: How to Make Saffron Rose Sugar

steps.headline: Place the saffron into a saucepan with the hot water.
Add the sugar.
steps.description: Bring the water to the boil while stirring constantly.

steps.headline: Once it boils, reduce to a simmer and cook for another 6 to 8 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove the syrup from the heat.
steps.description: Pour it over the prepared baking tray (sheet). Leave it to cool down completely.

steps.headline: Break the solidified syrup into small chunks.
steps.description: Throw them into the food processor along with the rosebuds. Process until a fine powder is produced.

steps.headline: Pour into an airtight storage container.
Use.
steps.description: Sprinkle it over dessert dishes, yoghurt, fruit salad, etc. and use it when baking.

text: Prepare the baking tray (sheet). Cover it with baking (parchment) paper. Place the saffron into a saucepan with the hot water.  Add the sugar. Bring the water to the boil while stirring constantly. Once it boils, reduce to a simmer and cook for another 6 to 8 minutes, stirring frequently.  Remove the syrup from the heat. Pour it over the prepared baking tray (sheet). Leave it to cool down completely. Break the solidified syrup into small chunks. Throw them into the food processor along with the rosebuds. Process until a fine powder is produced. Pour into an airtight storage container.  Use. Sprinkle it over dessert dishes, yoghurt, fruit salad, etc. and use it when baking.
